infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: The application requires access to your camera to allow you to upload items pictures.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: The application requires access to your photos to allow you to upload items pictures.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need to know your current location to be able to deliver your items.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We need to know your current location to be able to deliver your items.
